mapper.select: select count(case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m') then 1 end) as sum, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m') and t1.status='1' then 1 end) as solvedSum, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m') and t1.type='0' then 1 end) as normal, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m') and t1.status='1' and t1.type='0' then 1 end) as solvedNormal, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m') and t1.type='1' then 1 end) as major, count(case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_time,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(sysdate(),'%Y-%m') and t1.status='1' and t1.type='1' then 1 end) as solvedMajor, t2.area from t_risk t1 left join t_point_info t2 on t1.point_id = t2.id where t2.name is not null group by t2.area
select count(1) num,IFNULL(sum(case when status='1' then 1 else 0 end),0) finishnum from t_risk where DATE_FORMAT( report_time, '%Y' )= #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t1.dicname name,ifnull(t2.num,0) value from t_big_dic t1 left join (select CASE WHEN type = '0' THEN '一般风险' WHEN type = '1' THEN '较大风险' ELSE '' END typename,count(1) num from t_risk where DATE_FORMAT(report_time, '%Y')= #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by type) t2 on t1.dicname=t2.typename where t1.type='risk'
